description: TTS Engine Performance Benchmark Example Configuration

tests.name: ChatTTS-Default
tests.command: chattts -t 'This is a test text for evaluating speech synthesis speed and quality.' -o /tmp/chattts_default.wav

tests.name: ChatTTS-LowTemp
tests.command: chattts -t 'This is a test text for evaluating speech synthesis speed and quality.' -o /tmp/chattts_low_temp.wav --temperature 0.1

tests.name: ChatTTS-HighQuality
tests.command: chattts -t 'This is a test text for evaluating speech synthesis speed and quality.' -o /tmp/chattts_refine.wav --refine

tests.name: ChatTTS-CustomSpeaker
tests.command: chattts -t 'This is a test text for evaluating speech synthesis speed and quality.' -o /tmp/chattts_speaker.wav --speaker 42
